name: discord_post_message
description: Post a message to a channel.

name: discord_edit_message
description: Edit a message by ID.

name: discord_get_message
description: Get a single message by ID.

name: discord_fetch_messages
description: List recent messages (paginated).

name: discord_add_reaction
description: Add a reaction to a message.

name: discord_remove_my_reaction
description: Remove the bot's own reaction from a message.

name: discord_pin_message
description: Pin a message.

name: discord_unpin_message
description: Unpin a message.

name: discord_create_thread
description: Create a thread in a channel; optionally from a message.

name: discord_webhook_create
description: Create a webhook in a channel.

name: discord_webhook_list
description: List webhooks for a channel.

name: discord_webhook_delete
description: Delete a webhook by ID.

name: discord_list_roles
description: List roles in a guild.

name: discord_create_role
description: Create a role in a guild.

name: discord_delete_role
description: Delete a role in a guild.

name: discord_get_member
description: Get a guild member.

name: discord_kick_member
description: Kick (remove) a member.

name: discord_ban_user
description: Ban a user from a guild.

name: discord_unban_user
description: Remove a ban.

name: discord_create_invite
description: Create an invite to a channel.

name: discord_list_emojis
description: List custom emojis.

name: discord_list_commands
description: List global application commands.

name: discord_trigger_typing
description: Trigger typing indicator.

name: discord_get_audit_log
description: Fetch the guild audit log (filters supported).

name: discord_list_auto_moderation_rules
description: List AutoMod rules for a guild.

name: discord_get_auto_moderation_rule
description: Get a specific AutoMod rule.

name: discord_create_auto_moderation_rule
description: Create an AutoMod rule (see docs for structure).

name: discord_modify_auto_moderation_rule
description: Modify an AutoMod rule.

name: discord_delete_auto_moderation_rule
description: Delete an AutoMod rule.

name: discord_get_stage_instance
description: Get the stage instance for a stage channel.

name: discord_create_stage_instance
description: Create/start a stage instance.

name: discord_delete_stage_instance
description: Delete/end a stage instance.

name: discord_list_scheduled_event_users
description: List users subscribed to a scheduled event.

name: discord_list_thread_members
description: List members of a thread.

name: discord_join_thread
description: Join a thread as the bot.

name: discord_leave_thread
description: Leave a thread as the bot.

name: discord_get_guild
description: Get a guild by ID (bot must be in it).

name: discord_modify_guild
description: Modify guild settings (limited fields).

name: discord_get_welcome_screen
description: Get a guild's welcome screen.

name: discord_get_guild_templates
description: List templates for a guild.

name: discord_sync_guild_template
description: Sync a template to the guild's current state.

name: discord_delete_message
description: Delete a message by ID.

name: discord_list_pins
description: List pinned messages in a channel.

name: discord_crosspost_message
description: Crosspost a news channel message.

name: discord_get_reactors
description: List users who reacted to a message with a specific emoji.

name: discord_create_thread_from_message
description: Create a thread from an existing message.

name: discord_list_channel_invites
description: List active invites for a channel.

name: discord_list_members
description: List guild members (requires Guild Members intent).

name: discord_search_members
description: Search members by query string.

name: discord_modify_member
description: Modify a member (nick, roles, mute/deaf, channel).

name: discord_prune_count
description: Get prune count for members inactive X days.

name: discord_begin_prune
description: Begin a member prune.

name: discord_modify_role
description: Modify a role (name, color, hoist, permissions).

name: discord_modify_role_positions
description: Modify the positions of roles.

name: discord_get_emoji
description: Get a single custom emoji.

name: discord_modify_emoji
description: Modify a custom emoji (name/roles).

name: discord_modify_scheduled_event
description: Modify a scheduled event.

name: discord_follow_news_channel
description: Follow a News channel to another channel.

name: discord_get_current_user
description: Get the bot user.

name: discord_get_current_application
description: Get the current application.

name: discord_webhook_followup_create
description: Create a follow-up message for an interaction (token-based).

name: discord_webhook_followup_edit
description: Edit a follow-up message by ID (use @original for the original response).

name: discord_webhook_followup_delete
description: Delete a follow-up message by ID.

name: discord_get_webhook
description: Get a webhook by ID.

name: discord_modify_webhook
description: Modify a webhook (name/channel).

name: discord_get_webhook_with_token
description: Get a webhook with its token (token required).

name: discord_modify_webhook_with_token
description: Modify a webhook using token (name/avatar/channel).

name: discord_execute_webhook_advanced
description: Execute a webhook (content/embeds/components/attachments).

name: discord_edit_webhook_message
description: Edit a message sent by a webhook.

name: discord_delete_webhook_message
description: Delete a message sent by a webhook.

name: discord_list_voice_regions
description: List available voice regions (legacy/for completeness).

name: discord_list_guild_voice_regions
description: List voice regions for a guild.

name: discord_list_guild_invites
description: List active invites for a guild.

name: discord_get_thread_member
description: Get a thread member by user ID.

name: discord_add_thread_member
description: Add a user to a private thread.

name: discord_remove_thread_member
description: Remove a user from a thread.

name: discord_create_forum_post
description: Create a forum post (thread) with optional applied tags.

name: discord_get_guild_widget
description: Get the guild widget settings.

name: discord_modify_guild_widget
description: Modify the guild widget (enabled, channel).

name: discord_get_vanity_url
description: Get the guild vanity URL (if available).

name: discord_modify_vanity_url
description: Set the guild vanity URL (requires permissions).

name: discord_list_guild_integrations
description: List guild integrations (requires permissions).

name: discord_delete_channel_permission
description: Delete a permission overwrite on a channel.

name: discord_get_guild_onboarding
description: Get guild onboarding configuration.

name: discord_modify_guild_onboarding
description: Modify guild onboarding configuration.

name: discord_set_forum_tags
description: Set available forum tags on a forum/media channel (available_tags).

name: discord_create_guild_template
description: Create a new guild template.

name: discord_get_guild_template_by_code
description: Get a template by code (read-only).

name: discord_modify_guild_template
description: Modify a guild template's metadata.

name: discord_delete_guild_template
description: Delete a guild template.

name: discord_modify_own_voice_state
description: Modify the bot's voice state in a guild (channel_id, suppress, request_to_speak_timestamp).

name: discord_modify_user_voice_state
description: Update another user's voice state (requires elevated permissions; often restricted).

name: discord_get_guild_command_permissions
description: Get command permissions (requires OAuth bearer token; not available with bot tokens).

name: discord_list_soundboard_sounds
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] List soundboard sounds for a guild (undocumented; may change).

name: discord_create_soundboard_sound
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Create a soundboard sound (fields may change).

name: discord_modify_soundboard_sound
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Modify a soundboard sound (fields may change).

name: discord_delete_soundboard_sound
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Delete a soundboard sound.

name: discord_get_invite
description: Get an invite by code (supports with_counts, with_expiration).

name: discord_list_active_threads_channel
description: List active threads in a channel.

name: discord_list_active_threads_guild
description: List active threads in a guild.

name: discord_modify_stage_instance
description: Modify a stage instance (topic/privacy).

name: discord_list_guild_webhooks
description: List all webhooks in a guild.

name: discord_get_guild_ban
description: Get a single guild ban by user ID.

name: discord_list_sticker_packs
description: List Nitro sticker packs (read-only).

name: discord_get_sticker
description: Get a public sticker by ID (read-only).

name: discord_set_role_connections_metadata
description: Set application role connections (linked roles) metadata.

name: discord_get_original_interaction_response
description: Get the original interaction response message.

name: discord_get_guild_preview
description: Get a guild preview (public info, if available).

name: discord_get_scheduled_event
description: Get a single scheduled event by ID.

name: discord_bulk_overwrite_commands_global
description: Bulk overwrite global application commands (deploy pipeline use).

name: discord_bulk_overwrite_commands_guild
description: Bulk overwrite guild application commands.

name: discord_get_command_global
description: Get a single global application command.

name: discord_get_command_guild
description: Get a single guild application command.

name: discord_get_role_connections_metadata
description: Get application role-connections (linked roles) metadata.

name: discord_modify_guild_welcome_screen
description: Modify the guild's Welcome Screen (Manage Guild required).

name: discord_modify_guild_channel_positions
description: Modify positions/parents of channels in a guild.

name: discord_get_guild_widget_json
description: Get the public guild widget JSON (if enabled).

name: discord_get_guild_widget_image
description: Get the public guild widget image (PNG). Optional 'style' query parameter.

name: discord_modify_guild_mfa_level
description: Modify a guild's MFA level (owner 2FA required).

name: discord_modify_guild_sticker
description: Modify a guild sticker (name/description/tags).

name: discord_list_guild_channels
description: List all channels in a guild (excludes threads).

name: discord_bulk_delete_messages
description: Bulk delete 2–100 messages (cannot delete messages older than 14 days).

name: discord_get_channel
description: Get a channel by ID.

name: discord_delete_reactions_for_emoji
description: Delete all reactions for a specific emoji on a message.

name: discord_modify_my_nickname
description: Modify the bot's nickname in a guild.
